analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xe64b47931f28f89cc7a0c6965ecf89eadb4975f5.sol:
	Contract LudosToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xe64b47931f28f89cc7a0c6965ecf89eadb4975f5.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
